sources.title: The Dance Of Life 1929 Colorized
sources.description: Early talkie that is a fascinating time-capsule window onto the days of vaudeville. It follows the touching up-and-down relationship of two performers who fall in love. Stars Hal Skelly, Nancy Carroll, Al ('Fuzzy') St John, Oscar Levant. Colorized using DeOldify technology with additional tweaks in Avidemux. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0019798 (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
